verses.t: Therefore{G1223} we{G2248} ought{G1163} to give{G4337} the more earnest{G4056} heed{G4337} to the things which we have heard{G191}, lest at any time{G3379} we should let{G3901} them slip{G3901}.

For{G1063} if{G1487} the word{G3056} spoken{G2980} by{G1223} angels{G32} was{G1096} stedfast{G949}, and{G2532} every{G3956} transgression{G3847} and{G2532} disobedience{G3876} received{G2983} a{G3405} just{G1738} recompence of reward{G3405};

How{G4459} shall{G1628} we{G2249} escape{G1628}, if we neglect{G272} so great{G5082} salvation{G4991}; which{G3748} at{G2983} the first{G746} began{G2983} to be spoken{G2980} by{G1223} the Lord{G3588}, and was confirmed{G950} unto{G1519} us{G2248} by{G5259} them that heard{G191} him;

God also{G3588} bearing{G4901} them witness{G4901}, both{G5037} with signs{G4592} and{G2532} wonders{G5059}, and{G2532} with divers{G4164} miracles{G1411}, and{G2532} gifts{G3311} of the{G4151} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151}, according to{G2596} his own{G846} will{G2308}?
For{G1063} unto the angels{G32} hath he{G5293} not{G3756} put in subjection{G5293} the world{G3588} to come{G3195}, whereof{G4012} we speak{G2980}.

But{G1161} one{G5100} in a certain place{G4225} testified{G1263}, saying{G3004}, What{G5101} is{G2076} man{G444}, that{G3754} thou art mindful{G3403} of him{G846}? or{G2228} the son{G5207} of man{G444}that{G3754} thou visitest{G1980} him{G846}?

Thou madest{G1642} him{G846} a little{G1024} lower{G1642} than{G3844} the angels{G32}; thou crownedst{G4737} him{G846} with glory{G1391} and{G2532} honour{G5092}, and{G2532} didst set{G2525} him{G846} over{G1909} the works{G3588} of{G3588} thy{G4675} hands{G5495}:

Thou hast put{G5293} all things{G3956} in subjection{G5293} under{G5270} his{G846} feet{G3588}. For{G1063} in{G1722} that{G3588} he put{G5293} all{G3956} in subjection under{G5293} him{G846}, he left{G863} nothing{G3762} that is not put under{G506} him{G846}. But{G1161} now{G3568} we see{G3708} not yet{G3768} all things{G3956} put under{G5293} him{G846}.

But{G1161} we see{G991} Jesus, who{G2424} was made{G1642} a little{G1024} lower{G1642} than{G3844} the angels{G32} for{G1223} the suffering{G3588} of death{G3588}, crowned{G4737} with glory{G1391} and{G2532} honour{G5092}; that{G3704} he{G1089} by the grace{G5485} of God{G2316} should taste{G1089} death{G2288} for{G5228} every man{G3956}.

For{G1063} it became{G4241} him{G846}, for{G1223} whom{G3739} are all things{G3956}, and{G2532} by{G1223} whom{G3739} are all things{G3956}, in bringing{G71} many{G4183} sons{G5207} unto{G1519} glory{G1391}, to make{G5048} the captain{G3588} of{G3588} their{G846} salvation{G4991} perfect{G5048} through{G1223} sufferings{G3804}.

For{G1063} both{G5037} he that sanctifieth{G37} and{G2532} they who are sanctified{G37} are all{G3956} of{G1537} one{G1520}: for{G1223} which{G3739} cause{G156} he is{G1870} not{G3756} ashamed{G1870} to call{G2564} them{G846} brethren{G80},
Saying{G3004}, I will declare{G518} thy{G4675} name{G3588} unto{G3588} my{G3450} brethren{G80}, in{G1722} the midst{G3319} of the church{G1577} will I sing praise unto{G5214} thee{G4571}.

And{G2532} again{G3825}, I{G1473} will{G2071} put my trust{G3982} in{G1909} him{G846}. And{G2532} again{G3825}, Behold{G2400} I{G1473} and{G2532} the children{G3588} which{G3739} God{G3588} hath given{G1325} me{G3427}.

Forasmuch{G1893} then{G3767} as{G1893} the children{G3588} are partakers{G2841} of flesh{G4561} and{G2532} blood{G129}, he{G3348} also{G2532} himself{G846} likewise{G3898} took part{G3348} of the same{G846}; that{G2443} through{G1223} death{G3588} he might destroy{G2673} him that had{G2192} the power{G3588} of death{G3588}, that{G5124} is{G2076}, the devil{G1228};
And{G2532} deliver{G525} them{G5128} who{G3745} through fear{G5401} of death{G2288} were{G2258} all{G3956} their{G3588} lifetime{G2198} subject{G1777} to bondage{G1397}.
For{G1063} verily{G1222} he took{G1949} not{G3756} on{G1949} him the nature of angels{G32}; but{G235} he took on{G1949} him the seed of{G4690} Abraham{G11}.

Wherefore{G3606} in{G2596} all things{G3956} it behoved him{G3784} to be made like{G3666} unto{G3588} his brethren{G80}, that{G2443} he might be{G1096}a{G749} merciful{G1655} and{G2532} faithful{G4103} high priest{G749} in things{G4314} pertaining to{G4314} God{G3588}, to{G1519} make reconciliation for{G2433} the sins{G3588} of the people{G3588}.
For{G1063} in{G1722} that{G3739} he{G3958} himself{G846} hath suffered{G3958} being tempted{G3985}, he is able{G1410} to succour{G997} them that are tempted{G3985}.
